title: Where is the item page?
body: I don't know if it's my computer or what but I CANNOT find the item tab to create item pages for my champions. Since I updated to the new layout, I can't find where items are. Please help.

replies.body:
Item Sets haven't been built into the new client yet. In order to easily update or edit item sets and use them, you'll need to launch into the *Legacy Client* from the login screen:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg

You can keep up with discussions about New Client features and our plans for is on [**these boards**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion). Let me know if you have any questions.
Thank you for the info. 'Preciate it
